label.intro:
Course Evaluation

We are dedicated to creating excellent distance learning courses. Your responses to the following questions will help us improve our course design, instruction and the type of services we are able to offer online participants.

We appreciate you filling out this short survey. Most of the questions only require you to click on an answer, but there is room for your comments at the end.

Please follow the link below to provide feedback on the course.
